languages.text: "Боюсь, свободнее, чем сейчас, вы не будете. Я уже однажды допустил ошибку, поверив подобному обещанию Леди Теодоры — после этого она стала совершенно неуловима".

"I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, свободнее, чем сейчас, вы не будете. Я уже однажды допустил ошибку, поверив подобному обещанию Леди Теодоры — после этого она стала совершенно неуловима".

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid that this time is as spare as it will ever get for you. I once made the same mistake when Lady Theodora gave me a similar promise — she then made it impossible to discuss the matter ever again."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid that this time is as spare as it will ever get for you. I once made the same mistake when Lady Theodora gave me a similar promise — she then made it impossible to discuss the matter ever again."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai bien peur que vos devoirs ne vous en laissent guère le loisir. J'ai cru dame Théodora lorsqu'elle m'a fait la même promesse, mais je sais maintenant que c'était une erreur, puisque nous n'avons plus jamais eu l'occasion d'aborder ce sujet. Vous comprendrez donc qu'il s'agit là d'une opportunité à ne pas manquer. »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien peur que vos devoirs ne vous en laissent guère le loisir. J'ai cru dame Théodora lorsqu'elle m'a fait la même promesse, mais je sais maintenant que c'était une erreur, puisque nous n'avons plus jamais eu l'occasion d'aborder ce sujet. Vous comprendrez donc qu'il s'agit là d'une opportunité à ne pas manquer. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Me temo que no tendrá mucho tiempo libre de tareas. Lady Theodora hizo una promesa similar y cometí el error de creerla. Nunca volvimos a tener ocasión de hablar del asunto. Deberíamos aprovechar esta oportunidad al máximo».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no tendrá mucho tiempo libre de tareas. Lady Theodora hizo una promesa similar y cometí el error de creerla. Nunca volvimos a tener ocasión de hablar del asunto. Deberíamos aprovechar esta oportunidad al máximo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “恐怕您不会有太多业余时间。西奥多拉夫人之前也做过类似的承诺，而我错误地相信了她的保证，在那之后，我们就再也没能找到机会谈论这个话题。既然现在就是了解王朝历史的良机，那我们应该充分利用起来才对。”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕您不会有太多业余时间。西奥多拉夫人之前也做过类似的承诺，而我错误地相信了她的保证，在那之后，我们就再也没能找到机会谈论这个话题。既然现在就是了解王朝历史的良机，那我们应该充分利用起来才对。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「残念ながら、あなたには職務の合間を縫った時間が取れないでしょう。シオドーラ様も同じような約束をし、私はそれを信じてしまったが、これは間違いだった。同じ話題について話す機会はもう現れなかった。この機会を最大限に利用すべきです」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、あなたには職務の合間を縫った時間が取れないでしょう。シオドーラ様も同じような約束をし、私はそれを信じてしまったが、これは間違いだった。同じ話題について話す機会はもう現れなかった。この機会を最大限に利用すべきです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr werdet Euch ob Eurer Pflichten nur wenig Zeit nehmen können. Lady Theodora hat ein ähnliches Versprechen abgegeben, und ich habe den Fehler begangen, ihr zu glauben. Wir hatten nie wieder die Gelegenheit, darüber zu sprechen. Wir sollten diese Chance daher optimal nutzen."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, Ihr werdet Euch ob Eurer Pflichten nur wenig Zeit nehmen können. Lady Theodora hat ein ähnliches Versprechen abgegeben, und ich habe den Fehler begangen, ihr zu glauben. Wir hatten nie wieder die Gelegenheit, darüber zu sprechen. Wir sollten diese Chance daher optimal nutzen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Korkarım görevlerinizden arta fazla zaman kalmayacak. Leydi Theodora da benzer bir söz vermişti, ben de ona inanma hatasına düşmüştüm. Konuyu bir daha konuşma şansımız olmadı. Bu fırsatı sonuna kadar değerlendirmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid you will not have much time to spare from your duties. Lady Theodora made a similar promise, and I made the mistake of believing her — we never had the chance to speak on the matter again. We should make the most of this opportunity."
